description: Students read and discuss Dostoevsky's major novels from Poor Folk through Brothers Karamazov. Russian majors may take an additional section in the Russian language for major credit in this course. Prerequisite: completion of BTS-T. Offered alternate years in the spring semester.
name: Dostoevsky-Tr
notes: Open only to Seniors and Juniors during web registration.
prerequisites: completion of BTS-T. Offered alternate years in the spring semester.
